name: RitualsGenie
0:
”Alexa, turn on Rituals Genie”
”Alexa, turn off Rituals Genie”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To help you create a welcoming atmosphere of positive energy, Rituals introduces a more modern approach: The Perfume Genie. 
This innovative device helps you scent your environment with luxurious perfume remotely and with ease by using your smartphone.

You can login with your rituals account and turn your Rituals Genie on and off with your voice.
